stimulusHtml: How many points of inflection does the graph of  p  have?

features.html:
• Moving from left to right:
    • The curve enters the window in the second quadrant and decreases to reach a relative minimum in the third quadrant.
    • The curve then increases to pass through the origin and reach a relative maximum close to the origin in the first quadrant.
    • This relative maximum point has a y value less than the entrance point of the curve.
    • The curve decreases to reach a relative minimum in the fourth quadrant, but not as low as the relative minimum in the third quadrant.
    • The curve then increases back into the first quadrant and exits the window at a y value greater than that of the relative maximum near the origin.

The figure shows the graph of the quartic polynomial function  p .
